about_the_game:
Decades after our age, Mars has been colonized by an elite leaving the vast majority of our population on a tired Earth, devastated by wars, famines, diseases and other climatic throes.
Escaping a certain death, you embody a refugee therapist who joined a humanitarian mission settled on the Moon, the last neutral space, razor edge between life and death for Earth inhabitants.


In a 2D hand-drawn environment, meet your fellow companions, mingle in the rhythm of the camp and build strong links with the other refugees and volunteers. Through your adventure, learn about your friend’s past, the migration system of the Mars settlers and the dystopian world surrounding us.


Mysteries and plots will stand on your way to thwart the humanitarian mission. Find clues, gather testimonies and distinguish truth from falsity using logic and all information at your disposal. Unravel the truth about the strange events happening at the camp to preserve the humanitarian aid. Your survival depends on it!


Dive into the culprit’s subconscious and drive conversational therapies to help your friends. Ask the good question to guide their spirit, find out their most secret wounds and track down their inner demon to defeat them.


Resist an imperfect migration system, understand the stakes and questions revolving around refugee camp. Will you be strong enough to overtake human mistakes or will you feed the list of collateral damages?

short_description: Embody a displaced therapist in a futuristic refugee camp. Discover the life in the camp and share your everyday life alongside people with heavy pasts. Use logic and your therapeutic skills to solve mysteries threatening both your survival and the camp.
